page.title: Oil, Gas Prices Help Chevron Earnings
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - ChevronTexaco Corp.<A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CVX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CVX.N</A>, the No. 2 U.S. oil company, on Friday reported a rise in quarterly profit, pumped up by record oil and gas prices and gains on asset sales.
